name: Apple
description: A global technology company headquartered in Cupertino, California, that designs, develops, and sells consumer electronics, computer software, and online services.

name: Samsung
description: A South Korean multinational electronics company headquartered in Suwon, South Korea, that specializes in a wide range of electronic products including smartphones, tablets, TVs, home appliances, semiconductors, and memory chips.

name: Sony
description: A Japanese multinational technology and media conglomerate headquartered in Minato, Tokyo, Japan. Sony's business spans a wide range of products and services, including consumer electronics, video games, music, movies, financial services, and professional products.

name: LG
description: A South Korean multinational electronics company headquartered in Yeouido, Seoul, South Korea. LG's business spans a wide range of products and services, including consumer electronics, home appliances, air conditioning, chemicals, and telecommunications.

name: Dell
description: A multinational computer technology company that develops, sells, repairs, and supports a wide variety of computer-related products and services, including personal computers, servers, storage devices, network switches, software, computer peripherals, and HDTVs.
